front.title: The Java SASL Application Program Interface

abstract.t: This document defines a client-side and a server-side Java language interface for using the Simple Authentication and Security Layer (SASL) mechanisms for adding authentication support to connection- based protocols. The interface promotes sharing of SASL Mechanism Drivers and security layers between applications using different protocols. It complements but does not replace [SASL], which defines and exemplifies use of the SASL protocol in a language-independent way.
